short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: this extension is about website https://mynstrom.com/

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access a Mynstrom Account from your toolbar to quickly get reports about your job performance without intermission. 

It provides a lot of exciting offers through an online portal. Access your Payrolls online, Scheduling Online, and more can be done through the Mynstrom online. 

Features:
•	Employees can easily login with their username and password from anywhere.
•	They can get their complete details to check whether the information is correct or not.
•	Even employees can check the salary slips also.
